findings: All data paths in structural_spec exist in logic_schema or local data model.
All actions in structural_spec map correctly to logic_schema actions.
Verified actions: auth.login, inventory.fetch, device.scanner.scan, device.camera.capture, inventory.view_detail, inventory.delete_item, inventory.update_item
List iteration over /inventoryList aligns with List<InventoryItem> type.
Fields accessed ({name}, {sku}, {id}) match Entity Dictionary definitions for InventoryItem.
Writable components (TextFields) are bound to valid paths.
Note: 'selectedItem' is listed as a computed value in logic_schema but used as a mutable binding in structural_spec. This implies it acts as a transient form state derived from the selection.
